semanticInsights: This is a modern React application built with Vite and styled using TailwindCSS. The project follows a component-based architecture with clear separation of concerns. It uses Zustand for state management and implements a VS Code-like interface with panels, file explorer, and terminal integration. The application appears to be a development tool for analyzing JavaScript projects, with both frontend React components and backend Electron integration.

fileDescriptions.src/App.jsx: Main application entry point that handles initialization, loading states, and error boundaries. Sets up the core application layout with proper error handling and loading indicators.
fileDescriptions.src/components/layout/AppLayout.jsx: Core layout component that orchestrates the main application structure including header, sidebar, content area, and bottom panel. Manages responsive behavior and panel visibility.
fileDescriptions.src/components/panels/FileExplorer.jsx: Interactive file tree component that displays project structure with expand/collapse functionality. Handles file selection and navigation with proper state management.
fileDescriptions.src/store/appStore.js: Zustand-based global state management store that handles project data, UI state, terminal output, and semantic analysis results. Includes persistence for command history.
fileDescriptions.src/components/panels/AIActionsPanel.jsx: AI-powered analysis interface that provides various code analysis tools including structure analysis, bug detection, performance optimization, and LLM-powered semantic analysis.
fileDescriptions.backend/modules/aiAgentLLM.js: LLM integration module that performs semantic code analysis using Claude or OpenAI APIs. Handles prompt engineering, response parsing, and fallback mechanisms.

apiFlow: The application uses Electron's IPC (Inter-Process Communication) for backend integration. Main process handles file system operations, project analysis, and terminal management through dedicated modules. Frontend communicates via preload.js exposed APIs including project loading, tech stack detection, dependency installation, and AI analysis endpoints.
componentFlow: React components follow a hierarchical structure: App -> AppLayout -> (Header, Sidebar, MainContent, BottomPanel). State flows through Zustand store with clear separation between UI state, project data, and analysis results. Components use proper prop drilling and state lifting patterns with motion animations via Framer Motion.

criticalIssues.description: API keys for LLM services are stored in environment variables but may be exposed in client-side code
criticalIssues.recommendation: Ensure API keys are only accessible in the main Electron process and never exposed to renderer processes

criticalIssues.description: Large file content is being passed to LLM without proper chunking strategy
criticalIssues.recommendation: Implement intelligent code summarization and chunking for files larger than token limits

criticalIssues.description: Terminal output array grows unbounded which could cause memory issues
criticalIssues.recommendation: Implement circular buffer or pagination for terminal output with configurable limits

recommendations.description: Implement code splitting and lazy loading for panel components to reduce initial bundle size
recommendations.implementation: Use React.lazy() and Suspense for panel components that are not immediately visible

recommendations.description: Add comprehensive test coverage for critical components and state management
recommendations.implementation: Set up Jest and React Testing Library, focus on store logic and component interactions

recommendations.description: Implement input validation and sanitization for file paths and terminal commands
recommendations.implementation: Add path validation utilities and command sanitization in backend modules

recommendations.description: Consider implementing a plugin system for different analysis types
recommendations.implementation: Create abstract analyzer interface and plugin registry for extensible analysis capabilities

frameworkInsights: The React implementation follows modern patterns with functional components and hooks. Zustand provides clean state management without Redux boilerplate. TailwindCSS enables rapid UI development with consistent design tokens. Electron integration is well-structured with proper IPC boundaries. Consider adding React DevTools integration and implementing error boundaries for better development experience. The VS Code theme implementation is comprehensive and provides good UX consistency.
